title: 1935 Winnipeg Winnipegs season
text: The <a href="1935%20in%20Canadian%20football">1935</a> <a href="Winnipeg%20Blue%20Bombers">Winnipeg Winnipegs</a> finished in 1st place in the <a href="Manitoba%20Rugby%20Football%20Union">Manitoba Rugby Football Union</a> with a 3–0 division record. The Winnipegs became the first <a href="Western%20Canada">Western Canada</a> team to win the <a href="Grey%20Cup">Grey Cup</a>, with a <a href="23rd%20Grey%20Cup">victory</a> over the <a href="Hamilton%20Tigers%20%28football%29">Hamilton Tigers</a>.
